document.docAuthor: Nicolas J. Rawlence, R. Paul Scofield, Hamish G. Spencer, Chris Lalas, Luke J. Easton, Alan J. D. Tennyson, Mark Adams, Eric Pasquet, Cody Fraser, Jonathan M. Waters & Martyn Kennedy
document.docOrigin: Zoological Journal of the Linnean Society 177
document.masterDocTitle: Genetic and morphological evidence for two species of Leucocarbo shag (Aves, Pelecaniformes, Phalacrocoracidae) from southern South Island of New Zealand

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Genetic and morphological evidence for two species of Leucocarbo shag (Aves, Pelecaniformes, Phalacrocoracidae) from southern South Island of New Zealand
Zoological Journal of the Linnean Society

subSubSection.paragraph:
LEUCOCARBO STEWARTI (OGILVIE-GRANT, 1898 )
FOVEAUX SHAG .

:

. ( 2 nd ed.): 161 – Bluff, Southland. In part.
